text.value: Date must be in the future and less than edd
Date must be 10 months within the future
Cannot select other choices together with none!
Cannot select other choices together with none!
Cannot select other choices together with none!

bind.calculate: ( /pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_evaluation ='true' and count-selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/danger_signs_evaluation/danger_signs ) > 0 and not(selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/danger_signs_evaluation/danger_signs , 'none'))) or selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/nutrition_evaluation/muac_color , 'red') or selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/nutrition_evaluation/muac_color , 'yellow')

/pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_evaluation ='true' and (count-selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/maternal_mental_health/mental_danger_signs ) > 0 and not(selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/maternal_mental_health/mental_danger_signs , 'none'))) or (count-selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/maternal_mental_health/observed_mental_danger_signs ) > 0 and not(selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/maternal_mental_health/observed_mental_danger_signs , 'none')))

/pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_screening/is_pregnant ='yes' or /pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_screening/is_still_pregnant = 'yes' or ((( /pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_screening/is_pregnant = 'no' and /pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_screening/is_on_family_planning ='no' and /pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_screening/has_lost_pregnancy_within_last_month_initial_visit ='no') or /pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_screening/is_pregnant = 'unknown') and /pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_screening/known_lmp ='more_than_30_days_ago' and /pregnancy_home_visit/pregnancy_screening/pregnancy_test_result ='positive')

bind.relevant: (count-selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/maternal_mental_health/mental_danger_signs ) > 0 and not(selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/maternal_mental_health/mental_danger_signs , 'none'))) or count-selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/maternal_mental_health/observed_mental_danger_signs ) > 0 and not(selected( /pregnancy_home_visit/maternal_mental_health/observed_mental_danger_signs , 'none'))

bind.calculate: if( /pregnancy_home_visit/insurance/has_upto_date_insurance = 'yes', 'Insurance upto date', 'Insurance not upto date')

input.label: **If relocated remember to submit a muting request , if they died remember to submit a death report**

select1.label: Has lost a pregnancy within the last 1 month?

input.label: Use the PNC (Mother & Newborn) Services form to register delivery details
**Congratulate for taking up Family Planning and encourage her to continue on the method**
**Submit this form and use the Family Planning Services form to provide family planning education and counselling and referral.**

select1.label: Has lost a pregnancy within the last 1 month?
Has received post abortal care (PAC) at the health facility?

input.label: **Refer the mother to the health facility for post abortal care (PAC)**

**Reassure. Advice on Family Planning if Pregnancy is not desired and use the Family Planning Services to refer if Pregnancy is desired, advice on proper nutrition. You may refer to the health facility for pregnancy test.**

select1.label: Test for pregnancy. What are the results?

input.label: **Congratulate , educate them on the importance of starting ANC and refer to the health facility**
**Educate on Family Planning and refer to the health facility**
**Educate on need for pregnancy test and refer to the health facility**
**Educate on the importance of ANC visits and refer to the health facility**
**Educate on the importance of ANC visits adherence and refer to the health facility**

select.label: Educate on danger signs and select the danger signs she has

item.label: Swelling of the face and hands

input.label: **Provide nutrition counselling for 24 hrs recall and educate on the 10 food groups**

select1.label: Take MUAC. What is color of MUAC?

input.label: **Provide nutrition counselling on the 10 food groups and refer to the health facility**
**Congratulate on eating well. Encourage her to continue observing good nutrition**
**Provide nutrition counselling on the 10 food groups and refer to the health facility if need be**
**Educate about an individual birth plan. Together discuss transportation, delivery at the health facility, birth companion**

select1.label: Is taking her Iron or folate supplements daily?

input.label: **Provide education to on the importance of daily iron and folate intake throughout their pregnancy**
**Congratulate on daily intake of iron and folate and encourage her to continue taking iron and folate supplements**

select.label: Ask if has any of these mental signs
Observe if has any of these mental signs

input.label: Encourage to get an insurance cover if they don't have or to update their insurance cover
Congratulate and encourage them to continue updating their insurance cover
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
**Kindly submit the PNC visit report for if mother delivered**
